name: Pasta with Tuna and Vegetables
description: A healthy pasta dish loaded with tuna and vegetables, perfect for a quick meal.
steps: 1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add 200g of pasta and cook according to package instructions until al dente, usually around 8-10 minutes.
2. While the pasta cooks, wash and peel 50g of carrots. Cut them into thin slices.
3. Peel 100g of sweetpotato and cut it into small cubes.
4. Dice 100g of tomatoes.
5. In a large skillet, heat 20ml of olive oil over medium heat. Add the sliced carrots and sweetpotato cubes. Sauté for 5-7 minutes until they start to soften.
6. Add the diced tomatoes and 150g of drained tuna to the skillet. Stir and cook for another 3-5 minutes.

7. Once the pasta is cooked, reserve 1 cup of pasta water. Drain the pasta and add it to the skillet with the vegetables and tuna. Toss to combine, adding reserved pasta water as needed to create a light sauce.
8. Serve hot.

name: Egg and Potato Scramble
description: A hearty and filling egg scramble with potatoes, perfect for breakfast or brunch.
steps: 1. Wash and peel 150g of potato. Cut into small cubes.
2. In a skillet, heat 15ml of olive oil over medium heat. Add the diced potatoes and sprinkle with salt. Cook for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until golden and cooked through.
3. Meanwhile, crack 4 eggs into a bowl, add salt and pepper, and beat until well combined.
4. Add 50g of diced tomatoes to the skillet with potatoes and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
5. Pour the beaten eggs over the potato mixture in the skillet. Allow to cook for a minute, then gently stir the mixture until the eggs are scrambled and fully cooked.
6. Serve hot.

name: Banana and Apple Smoothie
description: A refreshing and nutritious smoothie made with banana and apple, perfect for breakfast.
steps: 1. Peel and slice 1 banana.
2. Wash and core 1 apple, then cut it into pieces.
3. In a blender, combine the sliced banana, apple pieces, 200ml of milk (or water), and 1 tsp of sugar. Blend until smooth.
4. Pour into a glass and serve chilled.

name: Sweet Potato and Beef Bake
description: A nutritious dish featuring sweet potatoes and beef, baked to perfection.
steps: 1. Preheat your oven to 200°C (400°F).
2. Wash and peel 250g of sweetpotato. Cut into thin slices.
3. Wash and peel 100g of carrots, and slice them thinly.
4. In a large bowl, mix 200g of diced beef with 30ml of olive oil, salt, and pepper.
5. In a baking dish, layer the sweet potato slices and carrot slices evenly.
6. Top with the seasoned beef mixture.
7. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Then remove the foil and bake for an additional 15 minutes, or until the meat is cooked through and the sweet potatoes are tender.
8. Serve hot.

name: Fish and Potato Cakes
description: Delicious cakes made from fish and potatoes, perfect as a snack or light meal.
steps: 1. Wash and peel 150g of potato. Cut into cubes and boil in salted water for about 15 minutes, or until tender.
2. Drain the potatoes and mash them in a bowl.
3. In the same bowl, add 200g of cooked fish (shredded), 1 beaten egg, salt, and pepper. Mix well to combine.
4. Form the mixture into small cakes.
5. In a skillet, heat 20ml of olive oil over medium heat. Cook the fish cakes for about 4-5 minutes on each side, until golden brown.
6. Serve warm.

name: Pineapple and Pork Skewers
description: Savory pork skewers infused with the sweetness of pineapple, perfect for grilling.
steps: 1. Cut 200g of pork into 2cm cubes.
2. Cut 150g of pineapple into similar-sized cubes.
3. In a bowl, mix pork cubes with 15ml of olive oil, salt, and pepper.
4. Thread the pork and pineapple alternately onto skewers.
5. Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium heat. Grill the skewers for about 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally, until the pork is cooked and browned.
6. Serve hot.
